text:
@realDonaldTrump “In the morning, there will be a coronavirus briefing for all members at 10:30,” McConnell stated on Jan. 23, noting the Senate Health panel was taking the lead on it.
His remarks represented the first time that the novel coronavirus was mentioned in Congress, tRump failed to act
